name: flux-core-master
description: Flux Core Nexus: Advanced Execution Environment

scripts.build:all: npm run build:win32 && npm run build:win64 && npm run build:linux && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:auto: node -e "const os=require('os'); const p=os.platform(); const c=p==='win32'?'npm run build:win64':p==='darwin'?'npm run build:mac':'npm run build:linux'; console.log('\x1b[36m%s\x1b[0m', 'Flux Core System Detection: ' + p.toUpperCase()); console.log('\x1b[33m%s\x1b[0m', 'Starting specific build sequence...'); require('child_process').execSync(c,{stdio:'inherit'});"
